arn.description: ARN of the Replicator. Do not begin the description with "An", "The", "Defines", "Indicates", or "Specifies," as these are verbose. In other words, "Indicates the amount of storage," can be rewritten as "Amount of storage," without losing any information.

description.description: A summary description of the replicator.

kafkaClusters.description: A list of Kafka clusters which are targets of the replicator.

replicationInfoList.description: A list of replication configurations, where each configuration targets a given source cluster to target cluster replication flow.

serviceExecutionRoleArn.description: The ARN of the IAM role used by the replicator to access resources in the customer's account (e.g source and target clusters).

serviceExecutionRoleArn.description: The ARN of the IAM role used by the replicator to access resources in the customer's account (e.g source and target clusters).

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Replicator resources.
